title: To climb a mountain
creator_credit: Ted Abenheim, Dennis Passaggio and BFA Educational Media
brief_description: Shows how blindness is a handicap that can be overcome. Presents a story about a young man and woman and a group of their friends who successfully climb a mountain. Explores their feelings about their accomplishments as blind people and examines the attitudes of society about blindness.
creator_credit_for_label: Ted Abenheim, Dennis Passaggio and BFA Educational Media
